healthify - Executive Assistant

Location - Bangalore, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time

Other August 01, 2022

Group Company:HealthifyMe Wellness Private Limited

Designation:Executive Assistant (HME_NOP_EACEO)

Office Location:Bangalore (India)

Position description:

We are seeking an Executive Assistant with experience in executive support and operations to help leverage our leadership and back our ever-growing team.

  • Assist primarily the CEO with organizational, financial, and personal administration daily.
  • Conducting detailed research and prepare background information for key business meetings/decisions.
  • Prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously and follow through on issues in a timely manner.
  • Email management for Director, keep track of correspondence, and ensure that all correspondence is dealt with appropriately and quickly.
  • Work with the Director to manage his/her calendar/ schedules, coordinating his travel itineraries.
  • Maintain effective liaison with all divisions and departments within the firm.
  • Plan, organize and manage staff meetings to be attended by the Director, prepare MOM and follow up on the tasks/actions decided in the meetings
  • Ensure that key dates and events are highlighted to the Director ahead of time.
  • Prepare important MIS reports and PowerPoint Presentations for the management.
  • Respect the need for confidentiality and sensitivity of the information.
  • Filter general information, handling queries, phone calls, and invitations to the CEO by redirecting or forwarding such contact as appropriate.
  • Facilitating and managing logistics for key events and projects to include: onsite/offsite employee functions, team building, all-hands meetings, performance reviews, operational planning meetings, and space allocation.
  • Coordinate internal and external meetings greet visitors/ arrange logistics for the meeting/ setting up meeting rooms, VC & Conference calls etc. Timely reminder of the meeting schedule.

Skills Required:

  • Minimum 3 years of related work experience as an Executive Assistant role
  • Advanced problem solving and planning skills to manage deliverables and timelines
  • Superb organizational skills to manage high-level communication with both internal and external stakeholders
  • Ability to communicate at all levels of the organization, driven, motivated to continually learn, the role has a deep career runway
  • Ability to successfully manage complex, fast-moving, and unexpected communications & challenges in order to deliver stellar results
  • Strong MS Office skills, specifically strong working knowledge of MS Excel (formulas, lookups, pivots) and PowerPoint
